reviewText: Jane did an amazing job cleaning my apartment. She was thorough, efficient, and paid attention to all the details. The place looks and smells wonderful. Will definitely book again!
providerResponse: Thank you for your kind review! It was a pleasure working with you, and I'm glad you're happy with the results. Looking forward to helping you maintain your beautiful home in the future.

reviewText: Sarah did a great job with my haircut. The style is exactly what I wanted, and she gave me some useful tips for maintaining it. The only reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is that the appointment started about 15 minutes late.
providerResponse: Thank you for your feedback! I'm happy you're pleased with your haircut. I apologize for the delay in starting your appointment and appreciate your understanding. We're working on improving our scheduling to ensure timely service for all clients.

reviewText: Tech Repair Masters were incredible! My iPhone screen was replaced quickly and professionally. They even threw in a free screen protector. The phone works perfectly now, and the price was reasonable compared to other places I checked.
providerResponse: Thank you for your wonderful review! We're glad we could help restore your iPhone to perfect working condition. The free screen protector is our way of helping protect your investment. We appreciate your business and look forward to assisting you with any future tech needs!

reviewText: My manicure and pedicure turned out beautifully! The salon was clean and relaxing, and the technician was very skilled and friendly. The gel polish has lasted over a week with no chips. Highly recommend!
providerResponse: Thank you so much for your glowing review! We're delighted that you enjoyed your experience and that your nails are still looking perfect. We use only the highest quality products to ensure longevity. Looking forward to seeing you again soon!
